title: "Canadian Tax FinTech Requiti Purchases Pinmo"
excerpt: "Canada-based Requiti, which helps Canadian companies understand tax incentives, has purchased financial technology firm Pinmo for $13 million CAD (approximately $10.3 million), according to a Monday (March 29) press release."
